commands_raw:
Astaroth: *mumbling*
---
Dalian: Excuse me, are you a resident here?
---
Astaroth: Obviously. Unless you're here to evict me
---
Dalian: I'm investigating the death of a resident Mr. Solomon here
---
Astaroth: Ah. The curious one. I warned him about reading things he didn't understand
---
signal(set,AstarothFirstTime,false)
-> questions
name: firstTime

commands_raw:
Dalian: I have some question to ask you
---

-> questions
name: secondTime

commands_raw:
Dalian: Where were you around the time 19-20
---
 Astaroth: Here. With my books. Same as every night
---
-> questions
name: where

commands_raw:
?> Where were you during the time 19-20 last night? -> where
?> Did you know the victim personally? -> know
?> Did you hear or see anything unusual that night? -> hear
?> Leave
name: questions

commands_raw:
Dalian: Did you know the victim personally
---
 Astaroth: He borrowed a book once. Didn't return it. That about sums up our relationship
---

-> questions
name: know

commands_raw:
Dalian: Did you hear or see anything unusual that night?
---
Astaroth: Unusual? For once, the building was quiet. Marchosias didn't have his nightly ravings like he usally does. 
---
Astaroth: First time in weeks I actually got some sleep
---
-> questions
name: Hear

commands_raw:
Dalian: You said you were in your room that night. But Grimory sayd you visited her around 19:30
---
Astaroth: Apparently I can’t loan a book without becoming a suspect. How thrilling.
---
Dalian: So you lied
---
Astaroth: I loaned a book from her. Briefly. I didn’t think it was relevant to a corpse
---
name: Lying
